Care & Maintenance: Use a tablecloth or thick cloth on surfaces subject to heavy use.
Avoid placing hot/cold items directly on the surface — use hot pads or coasters.
Keep furniture away from direct sunlight to avoid fading.
Do not slide objects to prevent scratches. Use candle holders for candles to prevent heat damage.
Clean regularly using a soft, lightly damp cloth; avoid rough rags or harsh pressure.
In case of spills, blot gently instead of wiping to protect the polish.
Avoid moisture exposure and contact with damp walls — promptly wipe dry with a lint-free cloth.

Material Care Instructions:
Avoid or limit direct exposure to sunlight.
Dust regularly with a dry, soft cloth.
Do not leave spills unattended.
Product Care Instructions:
Clean regularly with a soft microfiber cloth to avoid scratches.
Use a cotton swab moistened with water for edges and corners; dry immediately.
Avoid abrasive sponges to prevent surface scratches.
Prevent moisture accumulation; wipe immediately to avoid damage.
For sticky dirt, use a mild household cleaning agent.
Do not stand on shelves or place heavy objects to prevent breakage.
Avoid using force when opening or closing doors to prevent damage.
Sharp objects can cause scratches or gouges in the surface.
